abstract: Jury is selected in trial of Bill Baroni and Bridget Anne Kelly, former aides of New Jersey Gov Chris Christie who stand accused of using governor's office and Port Authority of New York and New Jersey to reward mayors who endorsed Christie and punish those who did not.

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The two days of jury selection underscored how much the case is about the New Jersey governor, even though he is not charged and has repeatedly disassociated himself from the lane-closing scheme.
snippet: The two days of jury selection underscored how much the case is about the New Jersey governor, even though he is not charged and has repeatedly disassociated himself from the lane-closing scheme....

headline.main: Jurors Picked for Bridge Scandal Trial as Opinions About Chris Christie Are Aired
headline.print_headline: Jury Is Picked in Bridge Case as Opinions About Christie Are Aired
